details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.1 General - Struct element parent
details.description: Struct element shall contain the P entry according to ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.7.2, Table 323

rule.description: Struct element shall contain the P entry according to ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.7.2, Table 323

error.message: A struct element does not contain the P entry
